scripts.html: rm -rf css images js *.html && cp src/*.html dist
scripts.images: rm -rf dist\images && mkdir dist\images && cp -r src/images/* dist/images/
scripts.js: rm -rf dist\js && mkdir dist\js && cp src\js\index.js dist\js\index.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:all: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:images && npm run build:js
scripts.dev: npm run build:all && parallelshell "npm run server" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js"
